description.english: Finish the Tutorial
Place your first brick
Clear your first row
Clear 10 rows
Clear 100 rows
Clear 1,000 rows
Clear 10,000 rows
Clear 100,000 rows
Clear 1,000,000 rows
Clear your first pit in any Mode
Clear 100 pits in Advanced Mode
Clear 1,000 pits in Expert Mode
Beat any first level
Reach Earth in the Solar System environment (Advanced or Expert)
Map the Solar System by beating the Sun level in the Solar System environment (Advanced or Expert)
Defeat the Troll in the Fantasy environment (Advanced or Expert)
Restore peace to the Fantasy Nation by defeating the Leviathan in the Fantasy environment (Advanced or Expert)
Find Red Shield's treasure in the Painted Forest environment (Advanced or Expert)
Defeat Agalorr in the Ice Cave environment (Advanced or Expert)
Begin the restoration process for Icea by defeating Aratea in the Ice Cave environment (Advanced or Expert)
Defeat Ferx in the Volcano environment (Advanced or Expert)
Prove you are the best Cube Warrior in the land by defeating Ferros in the Volcano environment (Advanced or Expert)
Finish all environments in Expert Mode
